mdRecord.dcterms:title: Thank You Note for Apples
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
A brief thank you note dated December 2, 97, presumably 1897. The letter reads:
Dear Maud, Papa is delighted with the apples, and ever-ever so much obliged. Sincerely, May-Day Harris -The apples are lovely
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
